reviews.review: Why are you reading this, if you have not got this game. What is wrong with you? Call for help! Great puzzle game. The best puzzle game.

litterally one of the BEST games ive ever played, genuinely, i honestly am astounded at how happy i am because of it, 10/10 EASY valve one of the best video game experiences ive ever had in my entire life
This game is WAY better than the first Portal.  I think we all have the same reason we like this game.  If you don't like this game, Ill have to delete you.  For science, you monster.

imagine portal gun actually exists IRL. Now I can teleport anywhere without using much energy.
 Maybe even space! But that would be bad isn't it? earth would be a vacuum space and everything dies.

Words cannot describe how good this game is. I've played through the single player campaign twice, and I have yet to do co-op (but hopefully I will soon). And to put it simply, it's a good, enjoyable game. And given that it's around a decade old, it doesn't require a powerhouse of a PC to run. Speaking from experience, you should be able to get away with a lower end or used laptop (preferably a used business class laptop as they are more more durable, but that's my opinion). In addition, the graphics still hold up, although the shadows are a bit pixely. The game is a 10/10, five stars, etc.

It's good.
muy buen juego encantador me recordo a mi infancia
People love it for a reason, just get it already

I'm speechless. This is the best game of all time
I played and beat this years ago on my Xbox 360 and replaying this on steam brought back so many memorys. 10/10.
Amazing vibes while playing the game

Awesome gameplay mechanics. I also really loved how you get some background information and also see the characters develop over time. Above all, the level design of the old Aperture complexes really got me in the mysterious mood of the game. The ending was really awesome and the length of the game was long enough so that one can really enjoy the game and short enough so that it didn't seem stretched. I will count it among my favourite games from now on.

Cave Johnson is forcing me to give this game a 9.5/10.
